data.partBlankContent: Jim felt like he was on top of the world! Everything w__ going h__ way, and not____ could g__ him do__. He w__ elated th__ his lu__ had he__ out, and h_ had got___ the j__. He would ride this wave as long as he could and let nothing get in his way.
data.fullContent: Jim felt like he was on top of the world! Everything was going his way, and nothing could get him down. He was elated that his luck had held out, and he had gotten the job. He would ride this wave as long as he could and let nothing get in his way.
data.answer: 吉姆感到高兴极了!一切都按他的方式进行，没有什么能令他沮丧。他很得意，因为他的运气还在，他得到了那份工作。他会尽可能地驾驭这波浪，不让任何东西挡住他的去路。
